This software makes use of a data table derived from the OSTN15 data set
published by the Ordnance Survey of Great Britain.  The following
information is reproduced from the OS user guide for the OSTN15 data
set:

> Data copyright and other intellectual property rights
> 
> The copyright and database rights in OSTN15 data is owned by Ordnance
> Survey Limited.  
>
> Trademarks
>
> Ordnance Survey, the OS logos and OSGB36 are registered trademarks and
> OSTN15 is a trademark of Ordnance Survey, Britainâ€™s mapping agency.
